K10D0292_H0295:495a-1: dh'a dz'a gra na n'a ma ma h'a s'u tra /
K10D0292_H0295:495a-3: mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba /
K10D0292_H0295:495b-0: @495b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0292_H0295:495b-1: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0292_H0295:495b-2: bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed du yul rgyu zhing
K10D0292_H0295:495b-3: gshegs pa na yangs pa can du phyin nas yangs
K10D0292_H0295:495b-4: pa can gyi spre'u'i rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa
K10D0292_H0295:495b-5: brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K10D0292_H0295:495b-6: de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab
K10D0292_H0295:495b-7: tu mang po yul rdo 'jug tu tshong bar bya
K10D0292_H0295:495b-8: ba'i phyir yul rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar chas pa'i
K10D0292_H0295:495b-9: yangs pa can gyi tshong ba rab tu mang po
K10D0292_H0295:495b-10: dag gis bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed du yul
K10D0292_H0295:495b-11: rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon
K10D0292_H0295:495b-12: nas yangs pa can gyi spre'u'i rdzing gi 'gram gyi
K10D0292_H0295:495b-13: khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos
K10D0292_H0295:495b-14: so // thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /
K10D0292_H0295:495b-15: mang po nas mang por lhags shing 'dus te yangs
K10D0292_H0295:495b-16: pa can nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
K10D0292_H0295:495b-17: ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0292_H0295:495b-18: zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu

K10D0292_H0295:495b-20: can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po phyogs bcig
K10D0292_H0295:495b-21: tu 'khod pa dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag

K10D0292_H0295:495b-23: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //

K10D0292_H0295:496a-3: de nas yangs ba can gyi tshong pa rab tu
K10D0292_H0295:496a-4: mang po dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag

K10D0292_H0295:496a-12: yul rdo 'jog tu mchig bar chas pa lags na
K10D0292_H0295:496a-13: / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
K10D0292_H0295:496a-14: thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs
K10D0292_H0295:496a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi tshong pa
K10D0292_H0295:496a-17: rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung pas
K10D0292_H0295:496a-19: de nas yangs pa can gyi tshong ba rab tu
K10D0292_H0295:496a-20: mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi

K10D0292_H0295:496b-11: dag gi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te

K10D0292_H0295:500b-0: kha zas phun sum @500b tshogs byin zhing //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-1: phun sum tshogs phyir de byas na //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-3: de phyir phun sum tshogs 'dod cing //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-4: phun sum tshogs don gnyer gang zag gis //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-5: shes rab phun tshogs bstan gyur na //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-6: des ni phun sum tshogs pa 'grub //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-7: de phyir bla med sangs rgyas dang //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-8: chos dang dge 'dun dag la ni //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-9: brtan pa dang bskyed byed pa //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-10: de sems phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-11: rig dang zhabs su ldan pa la //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-12: phun sum tshogs pa'i sems thob nas //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-13: dge ba'i las rnams byed gyur pa //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-14: de ni phun sum tshogs pa'i las //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-15: 'jig rten yang dag bzhin shes na //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-16: lta ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-17: 'phags shing mthong ba phun tshogs na //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-18: yid ni phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-19: dri ma thams cad bcom byas shing //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-20: mya ngan 'das pa phun sum thob //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-21: sdug bsngal zad par byed pa de //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-22: de yi don ni phun sum yin //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi
K10D0292_H0295:500b-24: tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos kyi
K10D0292_H0295:500b-28: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K10D0292_H0295:500b-29: rnam grangs du mar chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K10D0292_H0295:500b-32: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K10D0292_H0295:501a-0: @501a *// mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba rdzogs so ////
K10D0292_H0295:501a-1: rgya gar gyi mkhan bo dzi na mi tra dang /
K10D0292_H0295:501a-3: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sde
